contentrichtext.text: {{selfref|For the Wikipedia editing policy, see [[Wikipedia:Three-revert rule]].}} {{wiktionary|RR}} '''RR''' or '''rr''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} * [[rr (digraph)]] * [[Revised Romanization of Korean]], the official Korean language romanization system in South Korea * [[Rolls-Royce plc]], LSE code and logo ** [[Rolls-Royce (disambiguation)]] - most Rolls-Royce companies use RR logo * [[Roraima]], a state in Brazil * [[Range Rover]] * [[Randy Rhoads]] ==Entertainment== * [[RR (film)|''RR'' (film)]], a 2008 experimental film by James Benning * "[[Ren'ai Revolution 21]]", a song performed by Morning Musume ==Medicine== * [[Relative risk]], in statistics and epidemiology * [[Respiratory rate]], a vital sign * A [[rhesus factor]] phenotype * [[RR interval]] (R wave to R wave interval), the inverse of heart rate * RR, abbreviation for blood pressure measurements taken with a sphygmomanometer invented by [[Scipione Riva-Rocci]] ==Organizations== * Logo of [[Rajasthan Royals]], an Indian Premier League cricket franchise * [[Rashtriya Rifles]], an Indian counter-insurgency force * Logo of [[Rekords Rekords]], an American record label * [[Royal Air Force]] (IATA airline designator) ==Technology== * [[Rear-engine, rear-wheel-drive layout]], a term used in automotive technology * [[Resource record]], a term used in Domain Name System * [[Round-robin scheduling]], an algorithm for processes in an operating system ==Transportation== * A predecessor of the [[R (New York City Subway service)]] * Code for Regional Road, a class of road in Ontario (see [[County roads in Ontario#Glossary]]) ==See also== * [[R&R (disambiguation)]] * [[RRRR (disambiguation)]] * [[RRR (disambiguation)]] * [[R (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation}}
